评论详情: Really cute and fitzwell the fabric is great!
Material is thin, you may want to size up.
I was prepared for a low quality shirt but it’s actually pretty nice, I highly recommend. The sleeves are a little long but over all I definitely suggest you buy.

I was delighted with this long-sleeved off-the-shoulder women's shirt, a perfect choice for looking fashionable and going out in style in autumn. The gathered design adds a touch of elegance and sophistication that won me over from the first moment. The off-the-shoulder detail is simply lovely, and the best thing is that the blouse stays in place without falling off the shoulders, which is a plus in terms of comfort and practicality. I opted for the small size and the fit was perfect, flatteringly highlighting the figure. The quality of the fabric is remarkable, conveying a feeling of durability and good taste. The blouse not only feels good to the touch, but also looks great on, enhancing any outfit with its unique style. In short, I am more than satisfied with this acquisition and would definitely recommend it to other women who want to add a touch of fashion to their autumn wardrobe. A blouse that combines style, quality and comfort in an exceptional way.
This shirt is EVERYTHING. Flattering and stylish. I now need it in every color!
Can be dressed up or down. Very comfortable. It fits so well. Material is a bit thin so this is perfect for the spring and summer time.

This Darong Off the Shoulder Long Sleeve shirt is well made.  The ruching is just right -- not too much so it's not bulky.  The shoulders stay up because inside the shirt along the shoulder seamlines there is a sticky rubber (elastic isn't the word -- but I don't know what is!) that keeps the shirt in place on my shoulders! That is a very nice feature because so often with off-the-shoulder shirts, you're constantly shrugging to keep them up -- which admittedly I've done and it looks ridiculous!  THAT won't be a problem with this shirt.  IF I had one critique it would be that I wish the shirt was longer, resting further down the waist.  On me it's more of a crop-fit.
